id: scenario-value-scanner-retired-scenarios-household-managing healthcare costs and coordination for two aging partners
title: Managing healthcare costs and coordination for two aging partners
description: Managing healthcare costs and coordination for two aging partners
content:
Scenario: Managing healthcare costs and coordination for two aging partners
    Given Frank and his wife both have aging-related healthcare needs
    And healthcare costs are significant on fixed income
    And medication management becomes more complex with age
    When the household_elohim coordinates healthcare
    Then it should track both partners' medical appointments and needs
    And it should help manage medication schedules and interactions
    And it should coordinate healthcare spending with household budget
    And it should support both partners in advocating for each other
    And healthcare navigation should be simplified and supported
    And household should maintain health within economic constraints
